properties.headline: NRL Grand Final - Sunday 25 October - SYDNEY OLYMPIC PARK M4 Mwy, Homebush Bay Dr, Parramatta Rd approaching ANZ Stadium
properties.publicTransport: Route 525 and 526 buses will be diverting around closures in Sydney Olympic Park. Visit transportnsw.info to plan your trip.
properties.otherAdvice:
2020 NRL Grand Final: Panthers v Storm at ANZ Stadium, Olympic Park, kick off from 7:30pm, full-time 9:30pm approx. Preliminary game from 4:05pm. 

Traffic is expected to be heavier than usual on key roads approaching ANZ Stadium including the M4 Mwy, Homebush Bay Dr, Concord Rd, Lane Cove Rd, Parramatta Rd, Centenary Dr and Silverwater Rd.

Roads in the precinct will be closed from as early as 2am including sections of Olympic Blvd, Showground Rd, Murray Rose Ave and Dawn Fraser Ave. 

Motorists should allow extra travel time if driving in the area.

Fans are encouraged to arrive early and pre-book parking online ahead of time (available until 23:59 Sat 24 Oct)

properties.headline: Bledisloe Cup - Saturday 31 October - SYDNEY OLYMPIC PARK M4 Mwy, Homebush Bay Dr, Parramatta Rd, Centenary Dr approaching ANZ Stadium
properties.publicTransport: Route 525 and 526 buses will be diverting around closures in Sydney Olympic Park. Visit transportnsw.info to plan your trip.
properties.otherAdvice:
Bledisloe Cup - Wallabies v All Blacks at ANZ Stadium, Olympic Park kick off from 7:45m, full-time 9:30pm approx

Traffic is expected to be heavier than usual on key roads approaching ANZ Stadium including the M4 Mwy, Homebush Bay Dr, Concord Rd, Lane Cove Rd, Parramatta Rd, Centenary Dr and Silverwater Rd.

Roads in the precinct will be closed before and after the game including sections of Olympic Blvd, Showground Rd, Murray Rose Ave and Dawn Fraser Ave. 

Motorists should allow extra travel time if driving in the area.

Fans are encouraged to arrive early and pre-book parking online ahead of time (available until 23:59 Fri 30 Oct)

properties.headline: Cycle Ride - Sunday 1 November - NEWCASTLE WEST TO LOVEDALE via Hannell St, Industrial Dr, Maitland Rd, New England Hwy, John Renshaw Dr, Cessnock Rd and Wine Country Dr
properties.otherAdvice:
Around 200 cyclists will take part in the annual 58km Harbour2Vine Cycle Classic Ride travelling from the Rydges in Newcastle West to the Crowne Plaze Hunter Valley in Lovedale. Cyclists will ride in groups of 50 starting between 7am and 8:15am. 

Cyclists will travel via Wharf Rd, Honeysuckle Dr, Hannell St, Industrial Dr, Maitland Rd, New England Hwy, John Renshaw Dr, Cessnock Rd and will finish on Wine Country Dr in Lovedale by 1:30pm. 

Motorists should be aware of the groups of cyclists along the route as they share roads throughout the event.

Motorists are also reminded when overtaking cyclists to leave a 1.5m distance on roads with speed limits over 60km/h and a 1m distance on roads 60km/h or under.

roads.mainStreet: via Hannell St, Industrial Dr, Maitland Rd, New England Hwy, John Renshaw Dr, Cessnock Rd and Wine Country Dr

properties.headline: Randwick Race Day - Saturday 24 October - RANDWICK Anzac Pde, Alison Rd, High St approaching Royal Randwick Racecourse
properties.publicTransport: Visit transportnsw.info to plan your trip.

arrangementAttachments.displayName: Randwick Race Day Special event clearways
arrangementAttachments.fileName: Randwick Race Course Spring Carnival 19 September.pdf
arrangementAttachments.linkName: Randwick Race Day Special event clearways

properties.otherAdvice:
The Everest Carnival - Club Cup Day at Royal Randwick Racecourse from 12:50pm.

Traffic may be heavier on roads around the racecourse including Anzac Pde, Doncaster Ave, High St, Alison Rd and Darley Rd.

Special event clearway parking restrictions will be in effect on sections of Ascot St from 8am to 7pm and High St from 3pm to 7pm.

Clearways are strict no-parking zones, and apply even for local residents and RMS Mobility Scheme Permit holders. Check signs carefully as vehicles left in clearways will be towed and a fee applies.

arrangementElements.html:
Special event clearways are strict no-parking zones, and apply even for local residents and RMS Mobility Scheme Permit holders. Check signs carefully as vehicles left in clearways will be towed and a fee applies. If your vehicle is towed call 132 701 to find its new location.

RANDWICK 

FROM 8AM TO 7PM

  • Ascot St between Doncaster Ave and the roundabout at the racecourse (both sides)

FROM 3PM TO 7PM

  • High St between the gate 2 entry to UNSW and Anzac Pde (southern side)
arrangementElements.title: Special Event Clearways

roads.mainStreet: Anzac Pde, Alison Rd, High St
